price: 93. Il n’est pas (un seul être), parmi ceux qui sont dans les cieux et sur terre, qui ne doive venir en serviteur devant le Tout Clément.
arabic: إِن كُلُّ مَن فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ إِلَّآ ءَاتِي ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ عَبۡدٗا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: in kullu man fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi illā ātī al-raḥmāni ʿabdan
